articles.author: Vanessa Thorpe
articles.title: Hollywood actors' strike: entertainment desert looms and pain will spread wider - The Guardian
articles.description: The walkout by writers and screen stars won’t affect just the US film industry but production in UK and Europe
articles.content: There will be no fresh helpings of The White Lotus, The Last of Us or even Emily in Paris beaming into front rooms when summer fades. Nor will a screen version of the musical Wicked, starring Ariana … [+12924 chars]

articles.title: Building the World's Largest Eye: ESO's Extremely Large Telescope Reaches Construction Milestone - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The European Southern Observatory's Extremely Large Telescope (ESO's ELT) has reached the halfway mark in its construction. Once completed, it will be the world's largest telescope for visible and infrared light, featuring a pioneering five-mirror optical des…
articles.content:
ByEuropean Southern Observatory (ESO)July 16, 2023
